jobDescription: F5s Sales & Marketing Applications team in IT is seeking an intern for a six-month position.  An intern on this team will participate in several initiatives and projects across F5s IT organization in close partnership with other team members. You will have the opportunity to assist with business and systems analysis work using database technologies. You will execute on projects using your SQL programming skills and will use and learn with Salesforce.  You will work in a largely cooperative manner, being closely paired with other team members or others in the IT organization. You will gain experience in identifying priorities, effectively participating in projects in a manner that supports and extends the goals of team, department, and F5, and understanding F5s business needs from an enterprise architecture perspective. You will be mentored by more-senior team members to guide successful completion of assigned work in a manner consistent with F5s corporate principles and policies.What will you do?
